CatDescriptText: Mr. F. E. Hamilton, estimator, Allison Park, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that American citizens should receive Russia's first deputy premier, Anastas I. Mikoyan hospitably, or deport themselves in unhospitable fashion like some have done in several cities where Mikoyan has visited?" answer reads: �I don�t think that we should receive him as a guest. The reason-well, I don�t like communism.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of F.E. Hamilton, wearing fedora with dark band, eyeglasses, and square patterned necktie, standing with right hand in pocket, on Smithfield Street with C.A.Michel sign in background, Downtown
